thread.title: Trump still looking at June 12 summit with Kim

title: Trump still looking at June 12 summit with Kim
text:
Trump still looking at June 12 summit with Kim 5:17pm IST - 01:38
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Saturday he was still looking at a June 12 summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore, adding that talks were progressing very well. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Saturday he was still looking at a June 12 summit with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore, adding that talks were progressing very well.
